trends: There have been no other sightings in Vader
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out on my porch looking at the sky when I noticed a bright whit light that overpowered all the other stars in the sky. It was about the size of pencil lead and pure white. I watched it for it held steady for several munites an then it started to move to the right in a "Nike Shoosh". The light turned from brillant white to red during the movement.It vanished when it got dark red. From my position it was 215 degrees North Magenitic 3 fingers above the horizon and the total light path was about 4 fingers long. I used a compass and my finger measurements were at arms lenght.
